original_text: And Ehud reached with his left hand, took the sword from his right thigh, and thrust it into his belly.
korean_text: 에훗이 왼손을 뻗쳐 그의 오른쪽 허벅지 위에서 칼을 빼어 왕의 몸을 찌르매

sentences.original_text: And Ehud reached with his left hand
took the sword from his right thigh
and thrust it into his belly
